snippet: Attorney General Pam Bondi of Florida extended hospitality to a lobbyist from a Washington-based firm that specializes in building personal relationships with state attorneys general to help clients avoid becoming targets of investigation.
abstract: Continuing investigation by The New York Times into relationship between private lawyers and state attorneys general reveals that Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi invited lobbyist Lori Kalani to recuperate at her home after surgery; Kalani is attorney with Dickstein Shapiro, Washington-based firm specializing in building personal relationships with state attorneys general to help corporate clients avoid becoming targets of investigation.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Pam Bondi of Florida extended hospitality to a lobbyist from a Washington-based firm that specializes in building personal relationships with state attorneys general to help clients avoid becoming targets of investigation.

headline.main: Link Shows How Lobby Firm Cultivates Influence
headline.print_headline: Link Shows How Lobby Firm Cultivates Influence
